channel.title: CVE Feed for andialbrecht -- all

item.title: CVE-2023-30608|2024-08-02T14:28:51.924Z -- andialbrecht -- sqlparse
item.description: sqlparse is a non-validating SQL parser module for Python. In affected versions the SQL parser contains a regular expression that is vulnerable to ReDoS (Regular Expression Denial of Service). This issue was introduced by commit `e75e358`. The vulnerability may lead to Denial of Service (DoS). This issues has been fixed in sqlparse 0.4.4 by commit `c457abd5f`. Users are advised to upgrade. There are no known workarounds for this issue.
